page.title: 19A DAY IN BROUGHTON
page.content: TUE. 11th JUNE 1985 MY NAME IS TRACY BOSWORTH AND I LIVE IN BROUGHTON.I AM TEN YEARS OLD AND I HAVE A SISTER CALLED KAREN WHO IS EIGHT.MY BIRTHDAY IS NOV. 8th.I GO TO BROUGHTON C.P. SCHOOL. 7.00a.m. I WOKE UP 7.50a.m. I GOT UP 8.30a.m. LUCIANNE LARCOME ARRIVED 9.00a.m. SCHOOL STARTED 9.10a.m. MR. TEASDALEÂ£S ASSEMBLY 9.30 APPROXIMATELY COVERED MY WORKBOOK 10.30a.m. PLAYTIME 10. 45a.m. DID PRINTING 12.00a.m.DINNERTIME. AFTER DINNER IT WAS PLAYTIME.IDID GYM WITH MRS.HEATHCOTE. MY GYM SEQUENCE WITH LYNSEY MAWBY 1.15p.m. DID P.E.WITH MR.TEASDALE 2.30p.m.PLAYTIME 2.45p.m. MADE PRINTED BOOK 3.45p.m. HOMETIME 4.15p.m. ARIVED HOME WHEN I GOT HOME I PLAYED IN MY BEDROOM.LATER I HAD MY TEA.AFTER TEA PLAYED IN ROOM AGAIN 6.30p.m. HAD A BATH.9.10p.m. BED TIME
